ai.grakn.engine.tasks.storage

Class TaskStateGraphStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.engine.tasks.storage.TaskStateGraphStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskStateStorage

    public class TaskStateGraphStore
extends Object
implements TaskStateStorage

    Implementation of StateStorage that stores task state in the Grakn system graph.

    Author:
    Denis Lobanov, alexandraorth

    • Method Detail

      • newState

        public TaskId newState(TaskState task)
                throws EngineStorageException
        Description copied from interface: TaskStateStorage
        Create a new task state and store it, returning an ID to later access this task state.
        Specified by:
        newState in interface TaskStateStorage
        Parameters:
        task - State to insert.
        Returns:
        String form of the task id, which can be use later to update or retrieve the task state. Null if task could not be created of mandatory fields were omitted.
        Throws:
        EngineStorageException

      • updateState

        public Boolean updateState(TaskState task)
        Description copied from interface: TaskStateStorage
        Used to update task state. With the exception of @id any other fields may individually be null, however all parameters cannot be null at the same time. Setting any of the parameters to null indicates that their values should not be changed.
        Specified by:
        updateState in interface TaskStateStorage
        Parameters:
        task - State to update.
        Returns:
        true if inserted successfully

      • getState

        public TaskState getState(TaskId id)
                   throws EngineStorageException
        Description copied from interface: TaskStateStorage
        This is a copy of the internal TaskState object. It is guaranteed to be correct at the time of call, however the actual internal state may change at any time after.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface TaskStateStorage
        Parameters:
        id - String id of task.
        Returns:
        TaskState object or null if no TaskState with this id could be found.
        Throws:
        EngineStorageException

      • containsTask

        public boolean containsTask(TaskId id)
        Description copied from interface: TaskStateStorage
        Returns whether the storage contains the given task
        Specified by:
        containsTask in interface TaskStateStorage
        Parameters:
        id - String id of task
        Returns:
        true if the storage contains the given state

      • instanceToState

        public TaskState instanceToState(GraknGraph graph,
                                 Instance instance)
        Given an instance concept, turn it into a TaskState object. This is done by retrieving the serialized TaskState from the given graph and deserialising it.
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph in which to fetch serialized state
        instance - Task instance to turn into task state
        Returns:
        TaskState representing given instance

      • getTasks

        public Set<TaskState> getTasks(TaskStatus taskStatus,
                               String taskClassName,
                               String createdBy,
                               EngineID engineRunningOn,
                               int limit,
                               int offset)
        Description copied from interface: TaskStateStorage
        Return a Set of Pairs of tasks that match any of the criteria. The first value of the Pair is the task id, whilst the second is the TaskState. Parameters may be set to null to not match against then (rather than to match null values), if *all* parameters are null then all known tasks in the system are returned.
        Specified by:
        getTasks in interface TaskStateStorage
        Parameters:
        taskStatus - See TaskStatus enum.
        taskClassName - String containing task class name. See TaskState.
        createdBy - String containing created by. See TaskState.
        engineRunningOn - Engine that the task is running on.
        limit - Limit the returned result set to @limit amount of entries.
        offset - Use in conjunction with @limit for pagination.
        Returns:
        Set of TaskStates corresponding to search

      • getTasks

        public Set<TaskState> getTasks(TaskStatus taskStatus,
                               String taskClassName,
                               String createdBy,
                               EngineID engineRunningOn,
                               int limit,
                               int offset,
                               Boolean recurring)
